message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with evaluating video summaries, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper uses an NLP-based metric to measure semantic distance, which suggests cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as a possible sub-category. The paper also deals with publicly available video datasets, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.LG (Machine Learning).
